weird-deals.name: Baby hands candles
weird-deals.description: If you can get over the natural aversion to lighting a couple of eerily-lifelike baby hands on fire, you're in for a treat with these handmade, pure beeswax candles.
weird-deals.features: Easy to light, environment friendly, handmade, pure wax.

weird-deals.name: Gardening claws
weird-deals.description: Now you can garden like the wild beast you are. Just be sure not to fall into any wild animal traps you may have set back when you were a poor, claw-less human.

weird-deals.name: A hand squirrel
weird-deals.description: While it's all well and good to have a variety of puppets at your disposal, few things rival this strangely-realistic hand squirrel
weird-deals.features: this is a playable toy and totaly for kids

weird-deals.name: An angry Juliette Lewis mousepad
weird-deals.description: Whether you're a fan of Juliette and the Licks or just love Natural Born Killers, you can show your admiration for Juliette Lewis with this tasteful mousepad.
weird-deals.features: soft and easy to clean pad

weird-deals.name: An inflatable pool bull
weird-deals.description: When you want to turn your pool party up to 11, try this inflatable bull on for size and see if you can last eight seconds
